name: HELL, YEAH!
description:
HELL, YEAH!

It's a  rogue-like topdown-view game and it takes place in a satanic, hellish themed world, filled with cute but malicious demons, ghost and other underwordly beings! 

Play as a little witch and help her through the mysteriously shuffled tarotset that might seal her fate . 

Fight against the underworld beings, take part in gambling addiction and fight the devil himself, with your satanic powers!

The best way to fight fire, is with fire... 

Atleast that's what some say.


Movement           

  • Keyboard       W | A | S | D
  • Gamepad       Left Stick

 Dash

  • Keyboard      Spacebar    
  • Gamepad     South Button

 Attack

  • Keyboard     LeftMouse  | STRG | Right STRG
  • Gamepad    Right Trigger
